mainTopic: Here I share what is happening in my research and public activities. All articles and presentations are available for free download without copyright restrictions.
intro: My research topics are diverse, spanning over quantum mechanics, relativity, thermodynamics, evolutionary biology, psychoanalysis and philosophy of mind.
All articles and presentations posted on this site are Copyleft. Most of my peer-reviewed papers can be downloaded. Help yourself with the presentations as well.
